long_description: With a partial mesh inseam and UPF 20 sun protection, the ExOfficio Vent'r(TM) Pants are the answer for every hot weather adventure. Made from lightweight, quick-drying nylon that's treated for water- and stain-resistance. Pants have a drop-in gadget pocket on right leg, a zippered back pocket, zippered cargo pockets and hand pockets; waist has an adjustable internal drawcord and button closure. Closeout.
short_description: With a partial mesh inseam and UPF 20 sun protection, the ExOfficio Vent'r(TM) Pants are the answer for every hot weather adventure.
